definition: province
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: The drought has hit eight provinces that produce much of China’s wheat.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱已經打擊了作爲中國小麥主產區的8個省份。

sentences.english: A piece that is dislodged has no effect on the spaceprovince from which the mover came that dislodged it.
sentences.chinese: 被擊退的單位對發起進攻的省份沒有任何影響。

sentences.english: Alberta also produces more coal than any other province.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾伯達出產的煤也多於其他任何省份。

sentences.english: Paktia Province is a province of the Taliban are more active.
sentences.chinese: 帕克蒂亞省是塔利班較爲活躍的一個省份。

sentences.english: When the Worker-Peasant-Soldier Student graduated, a lot of them were assigned to the original units or provinces where they had worked in.
sentences.chinese: 工農兵學員畢業後，多被分配到原單位或原省份工作。

sentences.english: Partial counts have Mr. al-Maliki leading in two predominantly Shiite provinces. But Mr.
sentences.chinese: 部分計票顯示，馬利基在兩個什葉派主導的省份領先。

sentences.english: Xu toured Zhejiang seven times as his most favorite place.
sentences.chinese: 徐氏七次遊浙，浙江是他涉足次數最多的省份。

sentences.english: I and my girl live on different provinces.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子住在不同的省份。

sentences.english: Tent Rental for Events in Beijing &neighboring provinces.
sentences.chinese: 負責北京及周邊省份的大型活動用篷房租賃。

sentences.english: Liaoning Province is one of the main areas producing textile accessories.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧省是國內生產紡織器材的主要省份之一。

sentences.english: The fall-out will be concentrated in provinces such as Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 這種衰退將集中在諸如廣東省之類的省份中。

sentences.english: Another 2 billion was used to extend to 12 provincial-level administrative areas the program to grant subsidies to enable rural residents to buy home appliances.
sentences.chinese: 家電下鄉試點擴大到12個省份，補貼20億元。

sentences.english: Many provinces are also relaxing the hukou household-registration system.
sentences.chinese: 許多省份正在放鬆戶籍制度的限制。

sentences.english: Nearly half the population live in the five disaster-hit states.
sentences.chinese: 接近一半以上的人都住在五個受災的省份。

sentences.english: A cold wave sweeping across large swathes of China has forced power rationing in some provinces.
sentences.chinese: 侵襲我國多個地區的寒潮已導致部分省份拉閘限電。

sentences.english: This case led to the arrest of 651 suspects across29 provinces in the country.
sentences.chinese: 這起事件導致29個省份的651名嫌疑人被捕。

definition: municipality, namely: Beijing 北京, Tianjin 天津, Shanghai 上海 and Chongqing 重慶|重庆, the first level administrative subdivision/province level city/also called directly governed city
prefecture-level city
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
Jiangxi province (Kiangsi) in southeast China, abbr. 赣, capital Nanchang 南昌
provincial capital
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province
Hubei Province (Hupeh) in central China, abbr. 鄂[E4], capital Wuhan 武漢|武汉[Wu3 han4]

local/regional/district (not necessarily formal administrative unit)/region/area/as suffix to city name, means prefecture or county (area administered by a prefecture-level city or county level city)/CL:個|个[ge4]
midwest
Henan province (Honan) in central China, abbr. 豫, capital Zhengzhou 鄭州|郑州[Zheng4 zhou1]
whole nation/nationwide/countrywide/national
Heilongjiang province (Heilungkiang) in northeast China, abbr. 黑, capital Harbin 哈尔滨/Heilongjiang river forming the border between northeast China and Russia/Amur river
autonomous region, namely: Inner Mongolia 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区, Guangxi 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区, Tibet 西藏自治區|西藏自治区, Ningxia 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区, Xinjiang 新疆維吾爾自治區|新疆维吾尔自治区
country/nation/state/CL:個|个[ge4]
Anhui Province (Anhwei) in south central China, abbr. 皖[Wan3], capital Hefei 合肥[He2 fei2]
Inner Mongolia/abbr. for 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Inner Mongolia autonomous region
